citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10 am to
10:30 am on 16-Nov-17.
During that time, the inspector knocked on doors and waited at the facility.
